## Objective
Analyze relationship between inflation and interest rates using WDI data.

## Steps
1. Import data (2000–2024).
2. Merge datasets on country and year.
3. Clean missing values.
4. Plot relationship between inflation and interest rate.

## Summary
Scatter plot suggests general relationship between inflation and interest rate levels.
